Summary: Viewed during intermission between second and third period of NHL Winter Classic on NBC
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were 4 other sightings in Philadelphia on or around January 2nd 2012
divs: sighting detailswhile watching the nhl winter classic on nbc i noticed something very strange during the intermission between the second and third periods. a band was performing and as the camera filmed them, at 17:03, a bright rod\cylinder flew into frame above the roof structure on the left field side of the park. it changed directions slightly and quickly accelerated away from the camera. i recorded this on my dvr and have watched it numerous times and continue to be perplexed. i'm attempting to download a copy of this from my dvr so i may provide it as an attachment but this video could probably be found on nbc.
